entry.title: [BIP Proposal] Reduced Data Temporary Softfork
entry.summary: Dathon has acknowledged the feedback received on the new draft of the BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal) from the Bitcoin Development Mailing List group members. He is currently working on revising the draft to address the concerns and misunderstandings that have been raised. Although unable to respond individually, Dathon assures that all messages have been read and considered in his efforts to refine the proposal.
